description:
Part A: One day, Andou`s little sister Chiharu ends up visiting Chio at her house.
Part B: Yuki-chan does some outlandish things at times, but the girls find out she actually spends most of her time naked at home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die einzige Methode ist unschön / Yuki läuft keinem nach
Just One Masterful Method / Yuki-chan Bares It All
La méthode ultime / Yuki se dévoile
Tattahitotsu no Saeta Yarikata / Yuki-chan wa Matowanai
たったひとつの冴えたやりかた / 雪ちゃんはまとわない
